input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Gold Chain Set, 22"'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Silver Chain | 26"'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban Gold Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Essentials Gold Set'
  - Name='The GLD Shop Cuban Link Necklace 5mm Size'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link White Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON JX1 Automatic Cuban Link Gold Chain Watch'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 24" Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Gold Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Women's Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON Figaro Gold Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and design as the reference, same brand and material, only difference is chain thickness (10mm vs 8mm).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link design, but different finish (iced out and silver vs plain gold) and includes a set instead of a single chain, plus slightly different material emphasis.
Same Cuban link style and brand, likely similar construction though chain thickness and metal are unspecified, reasonably close to the reference.
Same brand and gold Cuban link style but is a set and length is specified; possibly similar construction but some ambiguity on thickness and other details.
Same brand and Cuban style but a set and chain thickness and metal type unspecified, less directly comparable.
Same brand, gold, and Cuban chain style set; somewhat similar to the single gold chain but in a set format and possibly varying sizes.
Same thickness (8mm) and Cuban link silhouette but different metal (silver vs gold). Very similar form and function otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban Gold Chain Stack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand and Cuban gold chains but targeted to youth and likely thinner/smaller chains stacked rather than a single 8mm chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Essentials Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand and gold Cuban style but different thickness (5mm), includes iced out decoration and a set - less similar to plain 8mm chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Cuban Link Necklace 5mm Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and smaller thickness (5mm), although same Cuban link style; less relevant due to different maker and size.
Same brand and exact style indicated, presumably very similar to the reference product, only thickness not explicitly stated.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet form, thicker size (10mm), iced out style - functionally different from reference's necklace chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Cuban Link White Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style and brand; white gold differs from yellow gold but similar form and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same thickness, brand, Cuban link style, and gold material; differs visually by being iced out, but structurally very similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON JX1 Automatic Cuban Link Gold Chain Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Incorporates a watch with Cuban link chain; different product function and accessory type, lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link gold chain, but thicker (10mm) and iced out style differentiates it somewhat.
Same brand and Cuban link style; length specified but thickness and material not stated; likely very similar product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Gold Chain Stack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Set of stacked chains targeting youth market; includes Cuban and rope styles, differs in presentation and likely size.
Same brand and style but significantly thinner (3mm vs 8mm) reducing similarity to the reference.
Same brand, style, and material but smaller chain thickness than reference reducing direct equivalency.
Bracelet product rather than necklace chain; same style brand but different function and form.
Different chain style (Figaro vs Cuban link) though same brand and gold material; low relevancy due to silhouette difference.
